params.name: size
params.description: Dictionary in the format {longest_edge: int} specifying the size of the output image. The longestedge of the image will be resized to the specified size, while the other edge will be resized tomaintain the aspect ratio.

params.name: resample
params.description: PILImageResampling filter to use when resizing the image e.g. PILImageResampling.BILINEAR.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the output image. If unset, the channel dimension format of the inputimage is used. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the input image. If unset, the channel dimension format is inferredfrom the input image. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.
